text: I think this is better suited to this channel than themes, sorry for double-posting!

Hi! I'm not sure if this is the correct location to put this but i was wondering if anyone has run into issues with the default content on the menu module in the drag and drop templates? The orientation and flyout radial options are not making any changes for me when I publish them. I'm probably missing something obvious but I haven't found anything in the dev docs.

Hello,
I would like some assistance, I need to add DnD coding to the module directly that I have build to prevent the footer from breaking when the template is cloned and used as a drop and drag editor.
Hello smart devs, Is it possible? how do I hide the font select and just leave size and other options? (using fields.json)

Hey Russell, I just updated our docs with this information. You can hide these options by using the “visibility” parameter as outlined here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#font>
